section.p: enables you to use the facilities of a commercial payment service provider (PSP) for the creation of invoices and payment collection. The billing data generated in are transferred to a PSP at regular intervals. The PSP can then create and deliver customer invoices, thus initiating the payment request.

For using the services of a PSP, you must have a valid contractual relationship with the PSP. Using the public Web services and APIs of , the services of any PSP can be integrated for your organization. Your operator is responsible for defining the necessary configuration settings in . He must specify the parameters for establishing the communication between and the PSP, and he must set up the payment types you want to offer to your customers. The operator can set any of the payment types allowed for you by the respective agreement with the PSP.
For details on integrating the services of a PSP with , refer to the Operator's Guide.
